## Stock ITSA Graph

```{r echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library (quantmod)
library (plotly)
library(dplyr)

startdate <- as.Date("2001-01-01")
enddate <- as.Date("2021-01-01")

itsa  = getSymbols('ITSA4.SA', src = "yahoo", from = startdate, to = enddate , 
                   auto.assign = F)
itsa = na.omit(as.data.frame(itsa))
itsa = itsa[-(1:5),drop=F]
itsa$date = row.names(itsa)
colnames(itsa) = c('Close', 'Date')
#itsa = itsa %>% mutate(action = case_when(Close<9 ~ 'Buy', Close>12 ~ 'Sell', TRUE ~ 'Neutral'))

#itsa$action = as.factor(itsa$action)

plot_ly (itsa, x = itsa$Date, y = itsa$Close, type = 'area')

```
